title: Roast beef with beer gravy
ingredients: ['100g bacon, diced', '1kg 1 (1kg) topside beef roasting joint', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 onion, sliced', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '4 carrots, coarsely chopped', '400ml stout', '250ml hot beef stock', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 tablespoons plain flour']
